ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt

Interface KeyAgreement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DHKeyAgreement, JCADHKeyAgreement, RIMDHKeyAgreement

    public interface KeyAgreement

    The interface that allows 2 parties to generate a shared secret by exchanging their public keys with each other.

    1. Initially, each user calls init() with their own public keys.
    2. Both users exchange public keys with each other.
    3. Each user calls generateSecret() using the public key they received.
    4. The result of generateSecret() is the shared secret that both parties know.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] generateSecret(PublicKey otherKey)
      Computes the shared secret.
      java.lang.String getAlgorithm()
      Returns the name of the algorithm used.
      byte[] getSharedSecret()
      Returns the shared secret computed using the last public key used by generateSecret().
      void init(PrivateKey initKey)
      Initializes the key agreement using the private key.

    • Method Detail

      • getAlgorithm

        java.lang.String getAlgorithm()
        Returns the name of the algorithm used.
        Returns:
        the name of the algorithm used.

      • generateSecret

        byte[] generateSecret(PublicKey otherKey)
        Computes the shared secret. The result is in MPI form.
        Parameters:
        otherKey - The other party's public key.
        Returns:
        The shared secret (in MPI form).

      • getSharedSecret

        byte[] getSharedSecret()
        Returns the shared secret computed using the last public key used by generateSecret(). The result is returned in MPI form. If generateSecret() has not been called before invoking this method, null is returned.
        Returns:
        the shared secret. Returns null if a shared secret has not been computed.

      • init

        void init(PrivateKey initKey)
        Initializes the key agreement using the private key.
        Parameters:
        initKey - The user's private key.
